meanings: (마차·수레·자동차 등을) pull, draw; (무거운 것을) haul; (운전하다) drive
take off to a police station

vlive.korean: 얘가 그거를 끌고 다니면서 저도 좀... The car will drag it around, and I will... 듣기 View video 강다니엘 (KANG DANIEL) : 👋👋
vlive.english: The car will drag it around, and I will...

vlive.korean: 이때 태용이가 허리 다쳐서 도영이가 끌고 가는 거 아니야? TAEYONG hurt his back so DOYOUNG is dragging him, right? 듣기 View video NCT 127 : [Full] NCT 127’s Punch COUNTDOWN
vlive.english: TAEYONG hurt his back so DOYOUNG is dragging him, right?

vlive.korean: [집에 갈 생각 없이 놀길래 아빠가 끌고 올라가 주셨어요...] [She was playing without thinking about going home so her dad dragged her up...] View video IU : [IU TV] 아이유 분노의 시승식!
vlive.english: [She was playing without thinking about going home so her dad dragged her up...]

vlive.korean: 백호야 끌고 와야지 - 그게 뭐예요? BAEKHO, just drag it. - What is that? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.11 뉴이스트의 우당탕탕 볼링 대결!
vlive.english: BAEKHO, just drag it. - What is that?

vlive.korean: 자전거 못 타서 끌고 다니는 거 아니죠? You're not dragging the bike because you can't ride a bike, right? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] Blueming 꽃이 피었습니다.
vlive.english: You're not dragging the bike because you can't ride a bike, right?

examples.korean: Our car was towed away by the police. 발음듣기 우리 차는 경찰이 끌고 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our car was towed away by the police. 발음

examples.korean: He hooked his foot under the stool and dragged it over. 발음듣기 그는 등받이 없는 의자 밑에 발을 걸어 그것을 끌고 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He hooked his foot under the stool and dragged it over. 발음

examples.korean: The wagons were hauled by horses. 발음듣기 그 수레는 말들이 끌고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The wagons were hauled by horses. 발음

examples.korean: The Queen’s coach was drawn by six horses. 발음듣기 여왕의 마차는 여섯 필의 말이 끌고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Queen’s coach was drawn by six horses. 발음

examples.korean: He was dragging his coat in the mud. 발음듣기 그는 외투를 진흙탕 속에 질질 끌고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was dragging his coat in the mud. 발음
